CA_CE_CONCESSIONAIRE_PROFILE.ATTENTION: Jordan Nasev, Majpr of the Municipality of Karbinci

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Organising transport of students enrolled at the elementary school “Strasho Pindjur” – Karbinci, municipality of Karbinci, during the academic year 2018 for the period of 1 (one) year

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport of students enrolled at the elementary school “Strasho Pindjur” – Karbinci, municipality of Karbinci, during the academic year 2018 for the period of 1 (one) year.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Route Star Karaorman-Nov Karaorman-Tarinci-Karbinci and vice versa

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 39 students -Route Star Karaorman-Nov Karaorman-Tarinci-Karbinci and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: On this route Total drive 39 students, out of which 4 Star Karaorman village, from the village of New 7 Karaorman and 28 of the village Tarinci

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: The village Star Karaorman is 7 km away of Karbinci. The regional road R-601 to move from the village to Star Karaorman are villages Karaorman Old, New and Karaorman Tarinci. Road construction is in relatively good condition.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 13 students - Route Crvulevo-Argulica-Karbinci and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: On this route Total drive 13 students, out of which 1 of Crvulevo village and 12 village Argulica

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: Crvulevo village of Bela is about 7 km away and to get there is a paved road which is in relatively good condition. This road is the village Argulica.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Route Dolni Balvan-Karbinci and vice versa

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 6 students - Route Dolni Balvan-Karbinci and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: The teaching of this township in elementary school "Strasho pindzur" - Karbinci attend 6 students including 1 student with special needs

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: Dolni Balvan the village Karbinci is 5 km away, are odagja asphalt road which is relatively dora condition.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 7 students - Route Route Odjalija-Kurfalija-Radanje and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: The teaching elementary school in the township "Strasho Pindzur" - Karbinci attend 7 students, 5 Odzhalija village and 2 village Kurfalija

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: The village is Odzhalija mountain township and Radanje is 12 km away. The road from the village to Radanje Odzhalija under construction and only about 9.5 km are asphalted, while the rest is just punctured (dirt road in poor condition) difficulties in road traffic in winter and during rain.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 30 students - Route Radanje-Karbinci and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: The teaching elementary school in the township "Strasho Pindzur" - Karbinci attend 30 students of the village Radanje

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: Radanje village located north of Bela at a distance of about 5.5 km and to get there is a paved road in relatively good condition.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Route Golem Gaber-Radanje and vice versa

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 3 students - Route Golem Gaber-Radanje and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: The teaching of this township in Pou Radanje visit 3 students

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: Golem Gaber village is a mountain township and Radanje is about 6 km away. The road from the village to Radanje Large Gaber just punctured (dirt road in poor condition) difficulties in road traffic in winter and during.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 43 students - Route Kucica-Prnalija-Ebeplija-Junuzlija-Kepekcelija-Kalauzlija- Karbinci and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: On this route a total ride 43 students, out of which 4 of Kuchica, 29 of Prnalija 1 of Ebeplija, 5 of Junuzlija, and 4 of Kalauzlija

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: The move from village to Kuchica Bela (Regional road R-601 Stip - Sq. Plackovica with asphalt pavement construction and is in relatively good condition) to a length of about 22 km in one direction are settlements.

Kalauzlija, Kepekchelija, Junuzlija, Ebeplija, Prnalija and Kuchica. This road is mountainous difficulties in road traffic in the winter period, characterized by major changes in elevation from one place to other villages. The village Kalauzlija R-601 asphalt road at length about 500 meters. The village Prnalija are coming asphalt road away from R-601 about 700 meters while the village Kuchica are coming at a local asphalt road through.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 1 student - Route Ebeplija-Prnalija and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: On this route total drive 1 student

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: Ebeplija village is located on the regional road R-601 and Prnalija village is about 3 km away and to get there is a paved road which is in relatively good condition.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 7 students - Route Junuzlija-Kalauzlija and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: On this route a total ride 7 students

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: Junuzlija village is located on the regional road R-601 and Kalauzlija village is about 4 km away and to get there is a paved road which is in relatively good condition.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Route settlement Vanco Prke-Krupiste and vice versa

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 1 student - Route settlement Vanco Prke-Krupiste and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: The teaching of this township in PU Krupiste visit 1 student

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: Vanco Prke settlement situated at a distance of about 3 km of the Highway Krupiste Krupiste-Probishtip. This road is asphalt pavement construction, which is in relatively good condition.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Route settlement Kozjak-Karbinci and vice versa

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Organising transport for 13 students - Route settlement Kozjak - Karbinci and vice versa

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: The teaching elementary school in the township "Strasho Pindzur" - Karbinci attend 13 students of the village Kozjak

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ABOUT_LOTS.P: Kozjak village located north of Bela at a distance of about 4 km and to get there is a paved road in relatively good condition.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: Transportation of 163 students, of whom: 39 students - Route Star Karaorman village - New Karaorman village - a village Tarinci - Karbinci village and back; 13 student - Route Crvulevo-Argulica-Karbinci and vice versa; 6 students - Route Dolni Balvan-Karbinci and vice versa; 7 students - Route Odjalija-Kurfalija-Radanje and vice versa; 30 students - Route Radanje - Karbinci and vice versa, 3 students -Route Golem Gaber-Radanje and vice versats; 43 students -Route Kucica-Prnalija-Ebeplija-Junuzlija-Kepekcelija-Kalauzlija-Karbinci and vice versa; 1 students - Route Ebeplija-Prnalija and vice versa; 7 students - Route Junuzlija-Kalauzlija and vice versa; 1 students - Route settlement Vanco Prke-Krupiste and vice versa, 13 students - Route Kozjak - Karbinci and vice versa.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Warranty for qualitative performance of the contract: Yes [10.00 %]

MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: Purchaser shall pay the Vendor on the basis of delivered invoice within 90 days after the end of the calendar month in which the service is delivered, the account in the bank which shall inform Vendor.
The days when the lessons were taught, the supplier will arrange transportation for students and for those days will be charged shipping.
Attachment of invoice receipt is duly certified by the Director of the MPS "Strasho Pindzur" - Karbinci.

LEGAL_FORM.P: The right to submit a bid Any interested domestic and foreign legal and natural person - bidder is registered for activity related to the subject of the contract and which is registered in the ESPP, or who can take the tender documentation directly from ESPP and for which the contracting authority has received electronic confirmation to download the tender documents, according to the Rules on how to use the ESPP (https://www.enabavki.gov.mk).

The right to submit a bid has a group of bidders without obligation for joining in appropriate legal form. The contracting authority will require the group of bidders to join in a specific legal form if it is selected as the winner of the procurement.

EXISTENCE_OTHER_PARTICULAR_CONDITIONS.P: The right to submit a bid Any interested domestic and foreign legal and natural person - bidder is registered for activity related to the subject of the contract and which is registered in the ESPP, or who can take the tender documentation directly from ESPP and for which the contracting authority has received electronic confirmation to download the tender documents, according to the Rules on how to use the ESPP (https://www.enabavki.gov.mk).

The right to submit a bid has a group of bidders without obligation for joining in appropriate legal form. The contracting authority will require the group of bidders to join in a specific legal form if it is selected as the winner of the procurement.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: In order to prove its personal status, the economical operator should submit the following documents:
— statement of the economic operator stating that no effective verdict has been pronounced in the past 5 years for participation in criminal organisation, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation that no bankruptcy procedure has been initiated by a competent authority,
— confirmation that no liquidation procedure has been initiated by a competent authority,
— confirmation for paid taxes, contributions and other public fees from the authority competent in the country where the economic operator has been registered,

— confirmation from the Registry for penalties for committed criminal acts of the legal entities stating that no secondary penalty, ban on participation in open call procedures, on awarding of contracts for public procurement and contracts on public-private partnership has been pronounced,

— confirmation from the Registry for penalties for committed criminal acts of the legal entities stating that no secondary penalty, temporary penalty or permanent ban on the performance of particular activity has been pronounced,

— confirmation stating that no misdemeanour sanction – ban on the performance of the profession, activity or obligation, i.e. temporary ban on the performance of a particular activity has been pronounced with the effective verdict.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — proof of relevant insurance for the licensed vehicles (policies and mandatory insurance of passengers in.
— List of vehicles for special line transport of passengers, fulfilling the minimum technical-exploitation conditions.

(to also attach a confirmation of fulfilling the conditions of the Rulebook on the special technical-exploitation conditions for vehicles for performing separate types of transport in road traffic), stating the planned route for each vehicle, vehicle registration, year of.

Manufacturing, date of the last registration, number of capacity (proof photocopy of the original valid vehicle registration document and photocopy of the statement from the license for the vehicle for special line transport),
— List of qualified drivers for each offered transport means that will perform the transportation (proof M1/M2 form) and photocopy of driver’s license for each of the drivers,

— List of available vehicles (minimum one vehicle) for special line transport of passengers that the economic operator owns, in case where the vehicle performing the service for a certain route experiences a defect. The vehicles need to meet the minimum technicalexploitation conditions. (proof photocopy of the original valid vehicle registration document and photocopy of the statement from the license for the vehicle for special line transport).

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — Proof of relevant insurance for the licensed vehicles (policies and mandatory insurance of passengers in public transport for each vehicle),

— List of vehicles for special line transport of passengers, fulfilling the minimum technical-exploitation conditions (for all vehicles), stating the planned route for each vehicle, vehicle registration, year of manufacturing, date of the last registration, number of capacity,
— List of qualified drivers for each offered transport means that will perform the transportation (proof M1/M2 form),

— List of available vehicles (minimum one vehicle) for special line transport of passengers that the economic operator owns, in case where the vehicle performing the service for a certain route experiences a defect,

— The vehicles need to meet the minimum technicalexploitation conditions (the economic operator needs to submit Confirmation for meeting the conditions of the Rulebook on the special technical-exploitation conditions for vehicles for performing separate types of transport in road traffic and for the available vehicles).

EXECUTION_SERVICE_RESERVED_PARTICULAR_PR.P: — License to perform special passenger transport, issued by the Ministry of Transport and Communications of RM, in accordance with the Law on Transport in Road Traffic (copy certified by the bidder with a seal and signature and designated “True to the original”),
— The statement from the license is submitted for each vehicle in their possession or leased in the name of the operator with which the operator bids for the separate part.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The subject of the contract is separable. Each route represents a separate part. The bidder may submit a bid for one, several or for all parts of the subject of the contract on public procurement. The bidder cannot separate the integral elements of each individual part. For each separate part of the subject of the contract a special electronic auction will be conducted using the Electronic Public Procurement System (https://www.enabavki.gov.mk).

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Meeting hall at the Administrative building of the Municipality of Karbinci, village of Karbinci

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: The public opening of tenders may attend any interested person. Only authorised representatives of bidders may participate in the proceedings of the public opening of bids by giving their comments in the minutes of the bid opening. Authorised representatives of the economic operators at the public opening must have an authorisation signed by the responsible person of the economic operator.

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: State Commission on Public Procurement Complaints
State Commission on Public Procurement Complaints
